feature_bullets: Fit for regular use: with each bottle weighing 106 gms, made of thick material tested thoroughly for the purpose
Safe storage: as the material used is PET, Grade 1 high-quality food grade plastic which is 100% BPA free
Colourful appearance: A set of 6 multi-coloured bottles of 1L each
Firmer grip and attractive design: with a pattern of squared checks on the body
Ease of use: ensured by smoothly opening lid and neck diameter of 3.2 cm which allows only appropriate quantity of water to come out
Spill-proof water storage: with snugly fitting lid
Ideal for storing cold water or water at room temperature. Not meant for storing hot water
product.feature_bullets_flat: Ideal for storing cold water or water at room temperature. Not meant for storing hot water. Spill-proof water storage: with snugly fitting lid. Ease of use: ensured by smoothly opening lid and neck diameter of 3.2 cm which allows only appropriate quantity of water to come out. Firmer grip and attractive design: with a pattern of squared checks on the body. Colourful appearance: A set of 6 multi-coloured bottles of 1L each. Safe storage: as the material used is PET, Grade 1 high-quality food grade plastic which is 100% BPA free. Fit for regular use: with each bottle weighing 106 gms, made of thick material tested thoroughly for the purpose.

top_reviews.title: Good quality & amazing colours 😍
top_reviews.body: Bottles are of good quality plastic maybe the food grade. The colours are vibrant but i feel the absence of green, which is my favourite one. Overall the bottles are good & they deserve the price & also the 5 star rating. Recommend... 👍👍 Thanks Amazon for this accurate time delivery.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Bottles are of good quality plastic maybe the food grade. The colours are vibrant but i feel the absence of green, which is my favourite one. Overall the bottles are good & they deserve the price & also the 5 star rating.
Recommend...
👍👍 Thanks Amazon for this accurate time delivery.

top_reviews.title: A bad purchase through and through
top_reviews.body: Really disappointed with this purchase. Bought a set of three and one broke up within two hours of the delivery. Several design flaws,  1. A single ring to seal the cap to the bottle. (Most others have 3-4 layers) 2. Plastic at the bottom could've been reinforced a bit. 3. Stylish, but cumbersome to hold at the bottom. Anybody would logically hold it by the cap or at the neck, both of which are slippery.  So the piece I've mentioned above was damaged precisely for the above three reasons. The bottle basically failed to latch on proper with the cap and fell from about knee height and now has crack at the bottom. Hence useless.  Give the other two at best a month or two before they meet the same fate.  Do a favor to yourself and avoid purchasing these folks. Unusual because most other Solimo products are a class apart quality-wise.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Really disappointed with this purchase. Bought a set of three and one broke up within two hours of the delivery. Several design flaws,

1. A single ring to seal the cap to the bottle. (Most others have 3-4 layers)
2. Plastic at the bottom could've been reinforced a bit.
3. Stylish, but cumbersome to hold at the bottom. Anybody would logically hold it by the cap or at the neck, both of which are slippery.

So the piece I've mentioned above was damaged precisely for the above three reasons. The bottle basically failed to latch on proper with the cap and fell from about knee height and now has crack at the bottom. Hence useless.

Give the other two at best a month or two before they meet the same fate.

Do a favor to yourself and avoid purchasing these folks. Unusual because most other Solimo products are a class apart quality-wise.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Top class
top_reviews.body: What a lovely set of bottles. Look and feel is just wow. And the size is ideal for either fridge or simply to be kept on the dining table. The colors are very attractive as well. Very high quality product.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
What a lovely set of bottles. Look and feel is just wow. And the size is ideal for either fridge or simply to be kept on the dining table. The colors are very attractive as well. Very high quality product.

top_reviews.title: Smelling and leaking.
top_reviews.body: The main problem is all the Bottles smell after keeping the water for minimum two hours... All the time I have to throw the left over water and wash properly which is very irritating. Second point it's Leaking from cap . one bottle specially the black colour the cap is not leak proofed... thought Amazon brand will be good but no. dissatisfied.Read more

The main problem is all the Bottles smell after keeping the water for minimum two hours... All the time I have to throw the left over water and wash properly which is very irritating. Second point it's Leaking from cap . one bottle specially the black colour the cap is not leak proofed... thought Amazon brand will be good but no. dissatisfied.

top_reviews.title: Horrible quality
top_reviews.body: The media could not be loaded. First when I received the bottle it had scratches all over them, then I placed it for exchange. Second time when I received the bottle the condition was even worse. It had scratches and were smelling awful. It didn’t even had that small package which protects it from smelling bad. Horrible experience!Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

top_reviews.title: "Worst products Amazon's SALIMO Water Bottle"
top_reviews.body: I never recommend salimo brand plastic water bottle because of Salimo bottles reproduce intolerable odd smell both in bottle & it's cap within 3 days after good washing. I am confused about it's hygiene level regarding human health. Moreover these bottles never produced bad smell during 1st 7 days after receive. It's shameful that Amazon's like brand name used 'Salimo' like products under Amazon Online Shopping....Read more

top_reviews.title: Plastic with good quality|| not handy when used while travelling
top_reviews.body: The plastic quality is good and shape, size & colour combination is good for a choice. The product was packaged properly.  There in one problem although...the cap of the bottle is little loose for you to handle from top..there are chances that by mistake if you keep the bottle in bag with little negligence then water will leak from bottle..  It is handy product to use in household only...you have to be very cautious while using it in travelling..if buyed for home use only then go for itRead more
top_reviews.body_html:
The plastic quality is good and shape, size & colour combination is good for a choice. The product was packaged properly.

There in one problem although...the cap of the bottle is little loose for you to handle from top..there are chances that by mistake if you keep the bottle in bag with little negligence then water will leak from bottle..

It is handy product to use in household only...you have to be very cautious while using it in travelling..if buyed for home use only then go for it
Read more
